attributes.action: Death penalty for killing young children
attributes.additional_details:
Death penalty for murdering young children

Responsible department: Ministry of Justice

Murders happens in society, but there is no excuse or reason to murder innocent children,especially young children.
An ever growing trend for parents to kill their own children.
Whatever reason the person has to commit murder or suicide,why do they also have to kill innocent children. If the parent or person survives they should be tried,convicted and hung.
